title: Nerf junglers
body:
Seriously, there is no reason for this role to hold the entire game hostage on how it will play out.
What you get with a bad jungler. id much rather see league become a 2-1-2 lane match up than this disgusting jungler role remain how it is.
0 ganks.
0 dragons.
0 barons or worst gets it stolen n throws the game.
0 towers cause the better jungler just pressured the shit out of every lane an they are hacking away at towers and getting tons of bonus gold.
0 vision control, cause the fed enemy team/jungler is now in your jungle putting your garbage can jungler even further behind.

What you get with a good jungler.
Lp, because right now the only fking role that matters is the one that influences every fucking lane an has every objective on lockdown.

replies.body:
did you use wave management to set up ganks for the jungler?

when there was battles over the scuttle crab in river, did you leave your lane for 10 seconds and respond to their ping to help them kill the enemy jg and get both of you fed?

when the jg pinged you they were comming to gank, did you just go back?  or farm minions?  or did you actaully stay and make that 2v1 get your team fed and give you lane advantage?

when your jungler pinged 400 times that drake was up and there was 5 man enemy bot, did you come down to help contest?  or did you stay in lane to get that cannon.

did you ward your river?  objectives?  buffs? so your jungler could watch/track enemy jg and all laners and make a plan accordingly?

when you and jg were both mid lane by raptors.  and there was a wave of minions.  did you let the jungler clear raptors while you cleared minions, then worked together on pushing lane forward after? (you know, since junglers earn no gold/xp off lane)

----------------

thing is.   for jg to be an impactful role.  requires teamwork.   requires a team that watches map.  knows how and when and where to freeze wave so that your jungler can gank.  responds to pings.  has a concept of macro.  makes plays NOW so that it will set things up for the next play, instead of just randomly fumbling about for things without a plan for what to do 1 minute from now.

if a jungler knows this.  and their team knows this.  its a win.

if jungler knows this.  and team doesn't   jungler is useless.

if team knows this and jungler doesn't.  team is disadvantaged by bad jg.

-----------

tldr.  its a team game.  if you play as a team.  you'll win.

dont be mad if a enemy jungle invades them constantly there should be more defenses to counterjungling maybe a monster camp pings that its being attacked by a enemy jungle as soon as its hurt a specific amount (this applies to early/mid game only) instead of wasting time walking to a empty camp feeling bad for the dead buff maybe put in a RIP grave option for compensation gold so walking there isnt a lost cause.

also i am one of those people who stand there for like 10 secs in disbelief how my buff is gone having a quick grieving processing  the whole thing.
I agree junglers are still too strong.
